name: dfifp3
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(wi(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))

stmt.origin: bitri(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(wi(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)), wa(wi(w0, w1), wi(wn(w0), w2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(wi(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(wi(w0, w1), wi(wn(w0), w2)))
-| wb(wa(wi(w0, w1), wi(wn(w0), w2)), wa(wi(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(wi(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(wi(w0, w1), wi(wn(w0), w2)))
-| wb(wa(wi(w0, w1), wi(wn(w0), w2)), wa(wi(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))

body.origin: |- wb(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(wi(w0, w1), wi(wn(w0), w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(wi(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wa(wi(w0, w1), wi(wn(w0), w2)), wa(wi(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))

stmt.origin: anbi2i(wi(w0, w1), wi(wn(w0), w2), wo(w0, w2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wa(wi(w0, w1), wi(wn(w0), w2)), wa(wi(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wi(wn(w0), w2), wo(w0, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(wi(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))
-| wb(wi(wn(w0), w2), wo(w0, w2))
|- wb(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(wi(w0, w1), wo(w0, w2)))

comment: Alternate definition of the conditional operator for propositions. (Contributed by BJ, 30-Sep-2019.)
